TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LabelTarget extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Used to represent the target of a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression">.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that contains a LabelTarget object by using the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Label%2A> method.
[!CODE [System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#43](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10#43)]

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The label's name is provided for information purposes only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the current <xref:System.Object>.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the current <xref:System.Object>.

Docs.summary: The type of value that is passed when jumping to the label (or <see cref="T:System.Void"> if no value should be passed).
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Type"> object representing the type of the value that is passed when jumping to the label or <xref:System.Void> if no value should be passed
